name: Umihara Kawase BaZooKa!
description:
New Umihara Kawase series!Umihara Kawase this time is fixed area battle action with several mode. And up to 4players both online and offline.The only rubbering action with "BaZooKa!Use the feature of rubber fishing line to bound to destination, perform pendulum action or etc are the points of rubbering action.
New action ""BaZooKa!"" is capture the opponents And Fire it to deal damage.
And Beginner Mode installed for Umihara Kawase beginners to enjoy rubbering action.Fixed area battle actionSingle gameplay. And up to 4 players battle royale in all 40 stages and 150 waves.StaffGame Design / Main Program: Studio Saizensen
Character Design: Kondo Toshinobu, Minato Amika-Minat's, Fumiya
